mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_article (atc_title, atc_content, atc_writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT atc_no, atc_title, atc_content, atc_writer, atc_regdate, atc_hit, atc_commentcnt FROM tbl_article WHERE atc_no > 0 ORDER BY atc_no DESC, atc_regdate DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
